name: 葉賜旭
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、控制系統的設計。實習項目：Visims介紹與應用、暫態響應、PID 控制的影響、控制器設計。
schedule:
1	Introduction	1
2       Mathematical Foundation	2
3       Mathematical Foundation	2
4	Block Diagrams and Signal-Flow Graphs	3
5	Block Diagrams and Signal-Flow Graphs	3
6	Block Diagrams and Signal-Flow Graphs	3
7	Modeling of Physical Systems	4
8	Modeling of Physical Systems	4
9	期中考
10	Stability of Linear Control Systems	6
11	Time-Domain Analysis of Control Systems (1)	7
12	Time-Domain Analysis of Control Systems (2)	7
13	Root-Locus Technique	8
14	Root-Locus Technique	8
15	Experiment #1
16	Experiment #2
17	Experiment #3
18	期末考
scorePolicy:
期中考：45%
期末考：45%
作業：10%
materials: Automatic Control Systems, B. C. Kuo and F. Golnaraghi, WILEY, 8th ed.
